MAP 

            Arguments
          * Name of the function
          * Iterable collection where we want our function to hit
          * Map in Python 3000 returns iterator not a list
def mult(val):
    return val * 2
my_list = [0, 1, 2, 10, 100, 1000]
iter = map(mult, my_list)
# Convert to a list
print(list(iter))

mani@mani-ubuntu:~/pydev$ python3 mod9a.py 
[0, 2, 4, 20, 200, 2000]
